http://snowstorm.sf.net is the open source version, and you can download
that for free. Runs on Linux, Windows, a few BSDs and BeOS. If you want
the original dos version, you'll either have to remember the password or
bug Tom until he sells it to you.

- Yan

On Mon, 2003-09-22 at 23:35, lildoc_2k4 wrote:
> Does anyone still have the full version? I have the demo and its a 
> really cool game. I just want to ge a download of the full thing.
